document.full_text: bahrain's king said a foreign plot against his sunni-led island state had been foiled, and the head of the gulf cooperation council warned that interference by shi'ite iran in the gulf arab states would not be tolerated.
document.title: bahrain says it has foiled "foreign plot"
lines_and_colors: bahrain's king said a foreign plot against his sunni-led island state had been foiled, and the head of the gulf cooperation council warned that interference by shi'ite iran in the gulf arab states would not be tolerated.
